Rulings.Tengu:
●Metamorphosis does not properly Summon a Fusion Monster, so you cannot use Monster Reborn on it afterwards.
●Tributing a monster is a cost.
●You can Tribute a face-down monster.
●If you activated “Soul Exchange” targeting your opponent’s monster, if the monster is face-down, you cannot Tribute it as a cost for “Metamorphosis”.
●You can Tribute a Monster Token (including a Sheep Token from Scapegoat).
●If there is no Fusion Monster with the same level as the Tributed monster in your Extra Deck, then you cannot activate this card.
●Metamorphosis vs. A Legendary Ocean: if you want to Special Summon a Level 6 Fusion Monster from your Extra Deck, you have to Tribute a Level 7 WATER monster on the field because it is treated as a Level 6.
Rulings.Goat:
●Metamorphosis does not properly Summon a Fusion Monster, so you cannot use Monster Reborn on it afterwards.
●Tributing a monster is a cost.
●You can Tribute a face-down monster.
●If you activated “Soul Exchange” targeting your opponent’s monster, if the monster is face-down, you cannot Tribute it as a cost for “Metamorphosis”.
●You can Tribute a Monster Token (including a Sheep Token from Scapegoat).
●If there is no monster with the same level as the Tributed monster in your Fusion Deck, then you cannot activate this card.
●Metamorphosis vs. A Legendary Ocean: if you want to Special Summon a Lv 6 Fusion Monster from your Fusion Deck, you have to Tribute a Lv 7 WATER monster on the field because it is treated as a Lv 6. 
●Q: Can a player take an opponent’s monster through some card effect and then activate “Metamorphosis” if they do not have any Fusion Monsters of the same Lv Stars in their Fusion Deck?
A: No. The player activating “Metamorphosis” needs a monster in their fusion deck that has the same number of Lv Stars as the monster that is being Tributed for the effect of “Metamorphosis.”

Rulings.Base:
1. "Metamorphosis" does not properly Summon a Fusion Monster, so you cannot use "Monster Reborn" on it afterwards.
2. Tributing a monster is a cost.
3. You can Tribute a face-down monster.
4. If you activated "Soul Exchange" targeting your opponent's monster, if the monster is face-down, you cannot Tribute it as a cost for "Metamorphosis".
5. You can Tribute a Monster Token (including a Sheep Token from "Scapegoat").
6. If there is no Fusion Monster with the same level as the Tributed monster in your Extra Deck, then you cannot activate this card.
7. "Metamorphosis" vs. "A Legendary Ocean": if you want to Special Summon a Level 6 Fusion Monster from your Extra Deck, you have to Tribute a Level 7 WATER monster on the field because it is treated as a Level 6.
